site_name: 2 - 10 Hermitage Lane And 1 - 4 The GraftonsLondonNW2 2ET
description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference  18/4674/FUL dated 30/07/2018 for `Demolition of all existing structures and the erection of ground floor plus part 3, part 4 storey building providing 52no residential units (Use Class C3) with associated access, servicing, car parking, cycle parking and landscaping`.  Amendments include changes to the main entrance and associated glazed screen. Adjustment of bin store doors and arrangement. Changes to external materials. Addition of terrace with railing and terrace door. Adjustment of automatic opening vents, smoke shafts and lift overruns.  Changes to fenestration to accommodate rooftop AOV. Update of windows. Single storey rear projection. Privacy screens to adjoining balconies/terraces. Building moved marginally to accommodate detailed party wall. Window and adjoining feature panel.
